item.description:
On the National release date (4/28) of his new book

Superfoods:The Food & Medicine of the Future

http://www.amazon.ca/...

www.amazon.ca/Superfoods-Medicine-Future-David-Wolfe/dp/1556437765

David Wolfe will be speaking about & signing his new book
at CATCH A HEALTHY HABIT CAFE!

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

The Event will sell out (this is open to the public)
The first 75 who pay will be a part of history!

$15 pre-paid with cash at the cafe or send check made out to
Catch A Healthy Habit
487A Campbell Avenue
West Haven Ct 06516

**Additional free parking is located behind the building
Being from West Haven, I am aware of the parking
Problems on Campbell Avenue.
I am also aware of parking areas
That others might not be aware of or use.
Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind
Glen's Cafe

On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony's Pizza Italian Restaurant
There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony's.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Glen's Cafe.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.
There is an alley between the buildings.
On Campbell Avenue, I turn left.
Glen's Cafe is a few stores in.

CAFE WILL BE OPEN FOR FOOD AND DRINK until 6:45
and then again after the event
*orders can be called in (203)521-7648

(I have already prepaid for this event.)
item.how_to_find_us: Glen is POC for this event

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: David Wolfe's new book "SUPERFOODS The Food and Medicine of the Future"
